mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board2 order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board2 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board2 (bno, title, content, writer) values ((select nvl(max(bno)+1, 1) from board2), #{title}, #{title}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board2 set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
